title: Queen
summary: A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets canceled.
critic_reviews: The film could easily be a half-hour shorter; shot in a loose, handheld style that involved some improvisation, it feels unfocused and repetitive at times, to the point of aimlessness.

reviews.content: For swimming against the Bollywood tide, Queen earns full marks. But purely in terms of a cinematic experience, Queen meanders, cliches, stereotypes and keeps repeating itself - again, the excellent cast and great attention to detail help.
